info.name: Outlook / Hotmail - DARK
info.description: Changes Outlook and Hotmail to dark colours.
info.additionalInfo: V2.1.1 (July 6th, 2018): ► Fixed broken parts of main page. └ Left side navigation, top navigation and right side popout elements. V2.1 (May 28th, 2018): ► Changed login background. └ The background for logging in will now change Daily or Weekly, which ever you set it to in "Customize Settings". ► Changed login form background. ► Fixes to Full Settings popup. V2.1 (May 27th, 2018): ► Added Beta theme. └ For those who don't like the darkness of "Dark" you can now chose "Grey" to make it a little brighter. There's also a "Blue" colour theme cause I can. :) ► Hovering over messages will light up the preview text. ► Fixed time stamp. ► Fixed most of the full settings popup. ► Fixed right side popout menus (My Account, Quick Settings) V2.1 (May 18th, 2018): ► Fixed opened emails for no preview window. V2.0 (February 15th, 2018): ► Updated for the new Beta layout. Old version is still supported. Just click on "Customize Settings" and select "Old"

options.label: Beta
Old
